participant_1.background:
I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors.
i have a timeshare in mexico.
I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix.
I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world.
i play music in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I used to rely on my own strength to stay healthy, but now I trust God to help me.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
i have a poodle named nanette.
i am in high school.
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.

content.text: Hey there!  How is your day going?
It is going well so far!  I just had a great time playing music with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I love music!
Me too!  I play guitar and piano.
That is so cool!  I wish I could play an instrument.
You should try it!  It is a lot of fun and it is a great way to express yourself.
I might just do that!  I have always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
That is great!  I would be happy to teach you how to play a few chords.
That would be awesome!  I would love to learn from you.
Anytime!  I am always happy to teach someone how to play the guitar.  Let me know when you want to start lessons.
